entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 4.
